thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 11 of 657
thread.title: Tyrel

author: Tyrel
title: Tyrel
text:
Good price. It was about half of what the eye doctor was charging.
Fast shipping. The frames I wanted were back ordered, but they ended up at my door about two weeks before the day they Quote: d to me. It was near the end of December.
Good service. They called and asked if I wanted to be charged then or wait until the frames shipped for insurance/flex account reasons which I appreciated.
My only concern was the frames had standard rather than spring hinges. I still put five stars because it was my mistake that I didn't check that detail before ordering.
